short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Danganronpa Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Danganronpa background. Danganronpa wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Danganronpa wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Toggle between random and favorite Danganronpa backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Note-taking feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Convenient access to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for quick navigation.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Option to explore more themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social networks.
13. One-click downloading of wallpapers.
14. One-click access to play games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Danganronpa tab.
